website_summaries.verdict: A liquid form of vitamin E that is easy to use as a supplement and more.
pros: Contains 400 IU of vitamin E per dose
Can be used a supplement and topically
Helps with skin issues, such as dark circles under eyes

customer_reviews.title: No flavor so very easy to add to my dogs' food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs had no problem with this oil supplement being added to their food. It was recommended by their VET to help with elevated liver enzymes. He prescribed the 400 iu daily.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Huff

customer_reviews.title: Taste is not good but excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Great using at the same time with PP and fish oil nordic brand with amazing results for apraxia!
customer_reviews.author: DDDLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Topically And ORALLY
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of liquid vitamin e for several years. I use it topically as well as orally, and feel it is a miracle vitamin. It is soothing, healing, and non toxic in any way that I have found. I cary a bottle of it with me all the time, using it on my lips, cuts, sunburns or any burn, dry skin, pimples (yes, even on pimples), .... it is amazing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sheila L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dog skin conditions
customer_reviews.text: My moms dogs have skin issues and she gives them this in their water daily so they all get it. Has resolved their skin conditions almost completely over time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs well, I would not take the recommended dose on it unless you are very deficient, I would take 1-10 drops or so for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take and taste is ok, children take with no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Liquid better than gel caps for sure
customer_reviews.text: It's a supplement I bought for my dog who has DM. The dropper makes things a lot easier to add to her food, but she doesn't seem to like it so much.. she leaves food behind recently, but that could be for many more reasons. I added to her water this morning and her food all disappeared .. hmmm Overall I'm happy with the purchase as cutting the gel caps I have is a real pain.
customer_reviews.author: JBF31643

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin E
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter who swears by it. She said she has been using it for awhile and sees a difference in her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen B

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This great product got here on the 28th of March and it was due April 1st to the 7th.. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for your hair.I am a natural curly girl low porosity hair and this "rocks"in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% E
customer_reviews.text: Very miss leading. This is not 100% vitamin E. Be sure to look at ingredients before purchasing and comparing prices.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again. It helps ease all the gums.
customer_reviews.text: Came just as it was supposed to be. I use it to put on my gums, for teething whitening protection and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: hope this bottle has a pump dispenser for easy application.
customer_reviews.text: this is miracle for skin. I use this on skin and works overnight. hope this bottle has a pump dispenser for easy application.
customer_reviews.author: Arpita Karmakar

customer_reviews.title: Goooood
customer_reviews.text: Good quality i love it very easy to take with jus taste not bad
customer_reviews.author: Meriem Elh

customer_reviews.title: Great for healing product
customer_reviews.text: Same good product as always for healing over skin sores and problems. Have purchased this for many years and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is what I really needed or not for my essential oil recipes but this is what I bought and it works fine as far as I know. It is a bit expensive for that though so maybe this wasn't my best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for product. TERRIBLE DELIVERY. DRIVER DESTROYED MY EDGING BECAUSE I  complained.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. product is great. DELIVERY IS TERRIBLE, AGAIN AND AGAIN. Is this how you treat your customers??
customer_reviews.author: Cabin Fever

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a moistuizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this product externally as a moisturizer and for getting rid of facial blotches and aging spots. It works great for that - on my face and hands. It actually gets rid of those brown mole-marks that appear with age when applied for a number of times directly to the spot. It's also good for sunburn - takes the sting out and helps the skin go tan.
customer_reviews.author: MM-good

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this vitamin e Oil. It's something that I will keep purchasing to make my lip balm with. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Can't compare
customer_reviews.text: Personally, it is a little oily for me but I never used any other vitamin E so I can't compare
customer_reviews.author: Jimnez Chin

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The product was as ordered and arrived immediately. I like it and the rest of the review is just to include enough words to meet the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Soy oil mixed in
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old needs to take a vitamin E supplement. I need a liquid as he won’t swallow pills. Very disappointed to receive this and see that it also contains soy oil. I’ll be returning as I don’t want to be giving my child non organic soy oil twice a day. It didn’t occur to me there would be other ingredients in a vitamin E supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Karamesic

customer_reviews.title: Used for Pet's Vitamin Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this to our dog as a needed supplement ordered by the vet. I was supposed to take a 400 mg capsule and puncture it to squeeze out the liquid on the dog's food. This was SO much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to do it
customer_reviews.text: I add a drop to water in order to have vitamin E for health purpose. Very easy to do it.
customer_reviews.author: siisii

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very easy to use. Super convenient liquid form
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: My first bottle. Love the liquid form.
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition with no leaks. Use 1 dropper of product for each dose. Not sure how long this bottle will last. My first bottle. Love the liquid form. I put in my EmergenC every day.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: She says it’s great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves all this stuff. I don’t know much about it but she says it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Oh58sabo

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy. Good taste. Works for me. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to measure with the dropper. Good quality. Lasts a long time. Good value. I put this in my FIV positive kitty cats food :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Lynn

customer_reviews.title: this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have to give my cats Vitamin E supplement, this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Captain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Warning: this has soy in it and it's not in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin E works
customer_reviews.text: Vit. E is what I ordered & I got it & it worked just fine. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: P. Cooney

product_meta.title: Solaray Vitamin E Drops 400IU | Unflavored w/Mixed Tocopherols | Healthy Heart, Antioxidant Activity & Skin Support | Vegan | 2 fl oz
feature_bullets: Drop of Health: Vitamin E in liquid form with dropper for easy-to-take and accurate supplementation
Get More E: Helps support normal, healthy cardiac function, antioxidant activity & skin health
Mixed Tocopherols: d-Beta, d-Gamma, d-Delta & d-Alpha included to enhance antioxidant activity
Trusted Brand: Manufactured in our own facility; Vegan & Lab Verified for purity & potency
Customers Say: "Love the ability to measure with the dropper. Good quality. Lasts a long time."
